flawed_nl_solution:
He runs at 0.1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=0.1>>0.1
While the album is playing he can run 4 miles because 40 x 0.1 = <<40*0.1=4>>4
He has to run 2 miles without the album because 6 - 4 = <<6-4=2>>2
Without music he runs 2/15 miles per minute because 4 / 60 = 2/15
He will run the remaining 2 miles in 15 minutes because 2 / (2/15) = <<2/(2/15)=15>>15
It will take him 55 minutes in total because 40 + 15 =<<40+15=55>>55

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1/15, not 2/15. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
